channel.title: Prayer glow sprite id's
channel.description: Anyone got the id's for the prayer glow sprites in the correct locations? Thick Skin through Smite.

item.title: Prayer glow sprite id's
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

3lv3n snip3r:

I’m trying to find the ID’s but every source I have downloaded has piety and chivalry and some of them have more than those 2.

Yeah, tested it some more, only the first 3 glow id’s work, the rest aren’t correct.

Read full topic

item.title: Prayer glow sprite id's
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

I don’t need the interface, this is for adding prayers server-sided.

I ripped these id’s from some wL server idk:

	public final int[] PRAYER_GLOW = { 83, 84, 85, 601, 602, 86, 87, 88, 89,
			90, 91, 603, 604, 92, 93, 94, 95, 96, 97, 605, 606, 98, 99, 100,
			607, 608 };

I only have 18 prayers, this has about 21. I would figure they would work anyways, but they don’t seem to work. I’m starting to think maybe my packet isn’t being sent correctly…

	public ActionSender sendConfig(int id, int state) {
		player.write(new PacketBuilder(36).putLEShort(id).put((byte) state)
				.toPacket());
		return this;
	}

I couldn’t find any documentation, so I asked a friend for this…

Read full topic
